settings.title: Great Pricing and Value
settings.text: Because we focus exclusively on servicing the needs of property managers, we can achieve economies of scales and efficiencies that enable to us to deliver the absolute best value for your flooring budgets.

settings.title: Get Started
settings.text: If you are interested in receiving our Totally Clear, Fully Transparent Proposal showing products, quantities and seaming diagrams.

settings.title: BROWSE CARPET AVAILABLE IN NORTHERN CALIFORNIA
Key Decisions When Selecting Carpet
settings.content: Carpet is the most popular product for the multi-family environment. In addition to costing less than any hard surface product like sheet vinyl or vinyl plank, carpet absorbs sound better than any other product. Choosing the right carpet depends on what your goals are with your property. We're here to help make the best flooring choices, contact us to learn more.

settings.title: Fiber
settings.text: Choosing the right fiber for your particular needs is critical. From nylon and polyester to Smartstrand, each has it's own distinct characteristics.

settings.title: Comparison Sheets
settings.text: We have detailed specs on all of our flooring products to help you make the best decisions.

settings.title: Vinyl Plank Available In Northern California
Value Engineering
settings.content:
Strategies to Reduce Flooring Expenditures.

At National Apartment Flooring, we are 100% committed to helping our customers reduce the amount of flooring they purchase and to maximize the amount of value that they receive. We have developed and implemented strategies that have helped our customers achieve this goal.

settings.text:
Direct Manufacturer Negotiations and Pricing

By bidding on materials between the major manufacturers, there will be significant savings. Similarly, by opening the bidding to a wider base of contractors, there will be considerable downward pressure on prices.

settings.title: BROWSE VINYL PLANK AVAILABLE IN NORTHERN CALIFORNIA
Key Decisions When Choosing Vinyl Plank
settings.content: Vinyl Plank is a great product for the multi-family manager. The enormous number of selections from the different manufacturers can be overwhelming. Here is a quick guide to help you evaluate which vinyl plank is right for you. We're here to help make the best flooring choices, contact us to learn more.

settings.title: Wear Layer Thickness
settings.text: The thickness of the wear layer will have more to do with determining the durability than any other factor. Wear layer thickness ranges from 6 mil to 30 mil. We recommend between 8 mil and 12 mil for apartments.

settings.title: Cost
settings.text: When evaluating the cost of vinyl plank, the all-in cost for an installation should be considered rather than the price per s.f. Sheet vinyl has an average waste factor of 15% to 30%. Vinyl plank on the other hand has about a 5% waste factor. As a result, vinyl plank is much closer in price to the sheet vinyl than it would appear.

settings.content:
Your common area spaces are one of your most important leasing and retention tools. We all have felt the impact of beautifully designed shared spaces. Research shows that beautiful common areas leads to higher rents. We can help you find the absolute best products and designs to maximize the impact of common areas.    

Today’s residents expect a lot in shared spaces. We can help you create beautiful, contemporary shared spaces that help attract new residents as well as retain your existing ones. Our expert guidance and full rendering service give you the tools to make the best decisions possible. 

We work closely with our manufacture partners to identify the right products as well as the right designs. 

Let us help you get the most from your common areas.

settings.title: Leasing Tool
settings.text: Your leasing office, gym, corridors, laundry rooms and other areas greatly impact a resident’s perception of your property. Your common area flooring is a central part of your “retail” look and can be an extremely valuable leasing tool.

settings.title: Rendering Services
settings.text: Send us a photo of your common area and we'll show you how great it can look with new flooring options.

settings.contact_content:
Let's talk about how NAF can help you find the perfect common area flooring solutions.

settings.title: Online Ordering Made Easy
settings.content:
Ridiculously easy Online Ordering on NAF Property Connect.
Seriously, it takes less than a minute to place an order. In addition to placing orders, you can check past orders and reprint invoices.
Everything we do is designed to make your life easier.

This program has been developed with the collaboration and feedback of our customers and we promise to continue to find solutions to make ordering accurate, quick and easy. If you are already a customer, please contact your NAF Account Manager to begin taking advantage of this service today.

If you're not a customer yet, contact us to learn more about online ordering, one of the many ways NAF can help you with your flooring needs.

settings.title: Our Service is Designed for Property Managers
settings.content:
Our flooring service has been built around the specific needs to apartment professionals.

We understand the critical role that your flooring provider plays in your property’s operations.

That is why we have engineered our service to provide you with exactly what you need.

1. Products In Stock for Next Day Installation

2. NAF Employed Installers

3. Detailed Due Diligence on Each Unit Type

4. Easy and Fast On Line Ordering

5. Order Acknowledgements sent for Each Order

6. Fast, Accurate Billing

7. Outstanding Customer Support for Any Flooring Need

settings.title: Fast, Easy and Dependable
settings.content:
At NAF, we are committed to be your most dependable and easy to use vendor partner.

We know how many responsibilities on site staff have.

Our goal is for you to place an order and simply not have to think about it again.

settings.contact_content:
Let's talk about how NAF can help you find the perfect flooring solutions.

*SMS CONTACT DISCLAIMER*
By providing your phone number, you consent to receive SMS notifications from us. Message and data rates may apply. You can unsubscribe at any time by replying "STOP" to our messages. We value your privacy. Your number won't be shared for marketing without consent.

settings.title: More Reasons To Use NAF
settings.content:
NAF has built the best flooring installation service available in the market. At the core of our service is our commitment to these three values: 
Integrity. Dependability. Transparency. We’re multi-family flooring experts. We specialize solely in apartments, which allows us to focus our efforts on doing them better than anyone else. We have engineered our processes to deliver the most consistent service possible. Here are some of the reasons why you should consider working with us.

settings.contact_content: Let's talk about how NAF can help you find the perfect flooring solutions.

settings.content:
At NAF, our mission is to provide apartment professionals with the best flooring solution imaginable. 

Flooring is an important tool for achieving your goals. 

We understand the important role we play in the management of your property, which is why every aspect of our service has been designed to meet the specific needs of apartment owners and managers.

settings.title: EXPERT AND UNBIASED ADVICE
settings.text: We provide expert and unbiased advice on product selection based on independent testing and our years of experience. Our job is to help you find the right products for your specific goals.

settings.title: TRANSPARENT QUANTITIES AND PRICING
settings.text: We offer transparency in quantities and pricing. The NAF Price Grid and Materials Take Offs give you complete peace of mind that you are getting exactly what you need.

settings.title: STRESS-FREE SERVICE
settings.text: We’ve built a service that is fast and easy to use. Using the NAF Online ordering or your ordering methodology, NAF makes ordering flooring simple and fast.

settings.title: BROWSE VINYL PLANK AVAILABLE IN SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
Key Decisions When Choosing Vinyl Plank
settings.content: Vinyl Plank is a great product for the multi-family manager. The enormous number of selections from the different manufacturers can be overwhelming. Here is a quick guide to help you evaluate which vinyl plank is right for you. We're here to help make the best flooring choices, contact us to learn more.

In addition to costing less than any hard surface product like sheet vinyl or vinyl plank, carpet absorbs sound better than any other product. Choosing the right carpet depends on what your goals are with your property. We're here to help make the best flooring choices, contact us to learn more.

settings.title: Vinyl Plank Available in Southern California
KNOWLEDGE BASE
settings.text:
Our Flooring Knowledge Base provides unbiased, reliable information and advice to help enable the best possible flooring decisions.

We empower you with the knowledge you need to succeed.

settings.title: DEPENDABILITY
settings.content: Site staff have a lot on their plates. We provide the fastest and most dependable service possible.  We stock your products to have them available for next day installation by our NAF employed and trained installers.

STEP I – WE START BY DEVELOPING A CLEAR UNDERSTANDING OF YOUR GOALS AND OBJECTIVES
We begin with discovering what goals you’re trying to achieve with your property and how flooring can help.  Your goals will drive the product we present to you. 

With the vast array of choices available, we help navigate you to the best materials for your needs. 


STEP 2  – WE PRESENT RECOMMENDATIONS AND PRODUCT SELECTIONS
We have researched and tested many flooring products and have chosen the ones that we believe offer the best value in the marketplace. 

We stock over 50 styles of vinyl plank and 25 styles of carpet.  We will make sure you are getting the right product for you and your property. 


STEP 3 – WE CONDUCT OUR PROPERTY DUE DILIGENCE AND PRESENT OUR COMPLETE PRICING
The next stage is to measure each of the floor plans at your property.  Then we calculate the quantities needed for each materials type. 

We then prepare and present detailed pricing of each floor plan that includes all costs. 


STEP 4 – ONCE WE ARE AWARDED WORK WILL COMPLETE THE PROPERTY SET UP AND TRAIN YOUR ONSITE STAFF ON OUR PROCESSES
Each property is then set up to begin ordering using their preferred method. 

Our NAF On Line Ordering is fast and easy to use.  It also assures that we get the information we need to perform each order quickly and efficiently. 

We also work with several third-party platforms including Ops Technology, Yardi and others.

settings.title: STEP 5. PROPERTIES BEGIN PLACING ORDERS
settings.text: After we have completed the set up and training, we will have stock of each of the products that will be used.  Your properties can begin to place orders for all their flooring needs.

settings.title: OUTSTANDING SUPPORT
settings.text: We have a team of professionals both in our office and in the field to support you with any flooring need. Our Installation Managers visit your property often to ensure quality and help you in any way needed.

settings.para-text: We are seeking flooring installers at National Apartment Flooring (NAF) in your area! We have daily work in carpet, plank, vinyl, and mixed flooring. NAF employs all our flooring installers, and you will not be a contractor, meaning you will also be eligible for benefits. NAF pays our installers for overtime work and adjusts pricing based on certain projects. We also provide all sundries, supplies, and certain types of equipment as needed. Please see more details below and apply today! We are hiring immediately passing an intro phone call. We have work in both Northern California and Southern California.

settings.Cent-text: We have positions currently open in the Greater Bay Area and the Greater Los Angeles Area. We are seeking installers with experience installing Carpet, Plank, and Vinyl. Please see below for more details

settings.List-text: Install various types of flooring materials, including carpet, vinyl, and plank.

Prepare the work area by removing old flooring, cleaning and leveling the surface, and
ensuring proper subfloor preparation.
Measure and cut flooring materials to fit the space accurately.
Install flooring according to schematics and manufacturer instructions
Use hand tools and power tools to complete installation tasks.
Repair or replace damaged flooring as needed.
Provide excellent customer service by addressing any concerns or questions from clients.
Collaborate with other team members to ensure efficient completion of projects.
Adhere to safety guidelines and maintain a clean work area.

settings.List-text-Q:
Previous experience as a flooring installer or in a related field such as maintenance -person, carpentry,
or remodeling is preferred.
Must have dependable truck or large vehicle
Knowledge of different types of flooring materials and installation techniques.
Ability to read and interpret schematics and follow instructions accurately.
Proficient in using hand tools and power tools commonly used in flooring installation.
Strong attention to detail and ability to work with precision.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot issues that may arise during installation.

Physical stamina and ability to lift heavy objects (e.g., rolls of carpet or boxes of tiles). -Knowledge of floor care and
maintenance techniques are a plus.

settings.sub-heading: We are always seeking experienced installers and all you need is your own work vehicle, a valid driver's license, and preferably tools.
settings.para-texts: Please fill out your information on this page and one of our managers will be in touch with you very soon. We look forward to hearing from you!

settings.banner-heading: Tired of Shredding Cash on Bad Flooring?
settings.para-text: Order Your Free Sample Kit and Step Towards Flooring Excellence
settings.form-paragraph: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

settings.quality-main-headings-no-two: See and Feel the Difference—For Free
settings.quality-main-headings-no-three: Order your free sample today and discover why countless property managers are making the switch to NAF.
settings.quality-paragraph:
Here at NAF, we understand that in the world of property management, every penny counts.

That’s why we offer premium flooring solutions designed to enhance your properties without cutting into your budget.

Our high-quality, durable flooring options are crafted to withstand the test of time and foot traffic.
settings.quality-paragraph-last: Touch, see, and feel the difference quality flooring can make—without opening your wallet.

settings.main_description: Floors that stand up to life's knocks
No hidden prices when you place an order.
Quick shipping to keep your projects on schedule.
Expert advice just a call or click away.

settings.main_description-one: As a token of our appreciation for considering NAF, we extend to you an exclusive offer.
settings.main_description-two: Place your first order within a week of receiving your sample, and we’ll slash 10% off for the first 3 months.
settings.main_description-three: Just our way of saying thanks for stepping into a partnership with NAF.
settings.main_description-four: Don’t let another dollar go to waste on flooring that doesn’t deliver.
settings.main_description-five: Click below to claim your free sample and start your journey to reliable, attractive, and costeffective flooring solutions today.

settings.form-sample_heading-one: Join the ranks of those who choose smart, sustainable flooring options.
settings.form-sample_heading-two: With NAF, experience the peace of mind that comes with making a wise  investment in your property’s future.
